body_html: I ran a pep8 test and found that most of the warnings were for spaces as 2 and 80 char limit. As for the spaces, I think that as per the above conversation we are going with 2 spaces convention. Char limit can be discussed. Also let me know if there are any other linters. I was a little busy, will also look myself today.

body:
I ran a pep8 test and found that most of the warnings were for spaces as 2
and 80 char limit. As for the spaces, I think that as per the above
conversation we are going with 2 spaces convention. Char limit can be
discussed.

Also let me know if there are any other linters. I was a little busy, will
also look myself today.
